main event: A report of a sighting of a cigar-shaped bluish object in the sky, observed as a bright light for about 20 seconds.
interesting points: The object was reported to be at a very high altitude and did not appear to be an aircraft., The sighting involved a semi-circular arc movement of the object from north to southwest., Observations were made from a position with unlimited visibility., The duration of the light observed was reported to be approximately 20 seconds., This report is part of the historical Project Blue Book documentation.
